message:
SLF4J Integration (#53)

* Using JUnit assumptions to skip tests instead of explicit returns

* Replaced internal.Log with SLF4J

* Integrating SLF4J into DB code

* Removed unused Log class

* Cleaned up log message generation

* Updated javadoc comments

added: public LogWrapper getLogger(Class component, String prefix) {
deleted: public LogWrapper getLogger(String component, String prefix) {
